TITLE: Open Educational Resources
DEF: A public repository of freely accessible, customizable teaching and learning materials
TASK: The pattern incorporates Open Educational Resources (OER) into education. This public, free, digital library of high-quality teaching and learning materials is available in various formats.The primary purpose is to promote equitable access to knowledge and reduce the cost of education. To enhance effectiveness, educators should curate high-quality resources, ensure proper attribution, and adapt them to fit their own learning contexts.
